title: The Diamonds Among Us: Words of Wisdom and Insight from People Who Have Been There and Done That
description: Discover powerful wisdom and insight on life from older people ages 59 to 107 years old, of all different races, cultures, backgrounds, and lifestyles! Gain access to excellent life advice on topics such as happiness, health, careers, relationships, mistakes, and more!This book is a collection of answers to over 40 important questions about life, and its unique question and answer style allows you as the reader to hear the raw, thoughtful insight and true perspective of each individual.Through this book, you will take a peek into the mindsets of older generations, learn the secrets to making the most of life, and gain guidance to real life situations by those who have already been there and done that!
author: Kyarra Keele
